articles.title: Pre-crime: Twitter will warn users about their 'HARMFUL' language, BEFORE they tweet - RT
articles.description: Twitter will now notify some users whenever they’re about to post a reply using “harmful” language. On a platform that’s already been pilloried for enforcing its rules haphazardly, the plan will surely offend potential offenders.
